title: 3.1 Master Challenge 1
question: Open the Move the shapes project that you made in Sprint 2.3. Draw another shape in the project. Program the shape to jump, turn right, turn left, and turn right again when tapped

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

input = 1
